name: Board of the Kings: A Chess RPG
name_original: Board of the Kings: A Chess RPG
description:
"Board of the Kings: A Chess RPG" is a tactical role-playing game based in the original thousand-year classic, Chess.

You are a king in the feuding lands of Caturess, a 64 square-tile area in continuous war. Your goal, through alliances and enemies, is to become the sole ruler of the land, and to conquer your sworn rival at the opposite end of the board.

  • Recruit and train a massive army of pawns, knights, bishops, rooks, and queens.
  • Level-up various recruits, giving them powers beyond the confines of the original board game, perhaps beyond the confines of Caturess itself!
  • Conquer squares of land, one-by-one, to build loyalty and reputation amongst your ranks.
  • Face off against seven power-hungry, equally pure-bred, and likely insane opponents who also rule over the land.

All this and more in "Board of the Kings"!

In development!
